summary: ENGINE IGNITION--COIL PACK FAILURE.    COLD START, COIL PACK FAILED WITHIN 20 SECONDS OF COMMENCEMENT OF DRIVING, NEARLY ONTO A MAJOR ARTERIAL ROUTE WITH MORNING COMMUTER TRAFFIC.  INSTANT LOSS OF POWER, FLASHING MIL ENSUED SECONDS LATER.  RETURNED TO HOUSE AND CALLED FOR WRECKER TO TOW TO DEALER.  PRESENTLY AT DEALER FOR REPAIR.  TOLD PART WOULD TAKE BETWEEN 2-10 DAYS TO ACQUIRE.
